column4: this worries me very very much (this is regarding the ToshibaNB205, i have a Gateway blahblah with the same wireless card) "Wi-Fi must be enabled in Windows XP before installing UNR or else it is impossible to enable it."
so windows was wiped immediately. am i screwed? how can this even be possible?
Did you reinstall Windows?
i can't, since it didn't come with any sort of restore anything, nor does the laptop have a cd-drive (nor do i have a windows cd)
Does it have a USB port and can it boot from USB?
yes and yes
May I interest you in a Linux Live install?

i've got fedora on it now, but can't seem to get the wireless card to work. so i'm now trying to install ubuntu since i've read that there's a prepackaged working solution in linux-backports-modules-jaunty
Hmm...What wi-fi card is it?
atheros AR9285
Would you benefit from a Linksys Wireless USB Dongle?  I hear Ubuntu has better compatibility with those
right, i just tried the ubuntu live usb netbook image, and that dies with "can't find module/something"
If you can get the exact error message, we may be able to help you with that
retrying boot now (i build the current snapshot of the drivers from linuxwireless.org, and still no dice. i think this is a hardware-being-disabled-somehow thing)
as in, somehow it needs to be enabled from windows (which strikes me as a huge wtf)
do you know how to configure the BIOS?
yes, there doesn't seem to be any options in the bios setup related to the wireless card

the reason i think it's hardware or something is that i just read "Wi-Fi must be enabled in Windows XP before installing UNR or else it is impossible to enable it. "   here    https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport/Machines/Netbooks/ToshibaNB205
Can you try the Ubuntu Desktop version and see if that works?
hmm, is there any way to transfer that .iso to a usb key for boot?
I cannot help you there...Someone else in here may be able to tell you how to do that
Have you tried the Ubuntu Desktop image?
not yet, downloading the desktop version
It probably will not give you the results you want, however
